Specific Details: The HSE reimbursement of gene therapy 'Luxturna'
DPOs Lobbied: Stephen Donnelly|Minister|Department of Health::Pádraig O'Sullivan|TD|Dáil Éireann, the Oireachtas::Neasa Hourigan|TD|Dáil Éireann, the Oireachtas
Subject Matter: The HSE reimbursement of gene therapy 'Luxturna'
Intended Results: Fighting Blindness hopes to have gene therapy Luxturna made available to those patients with a mutated RPE65 gene that causes sight loss.
Lobbying Activities: Seeking update on decision-making progress; raising parliamentary questions. The HTA process from rapid review has already taken one year longer than the average. Ireland is now the only country in Western Europe not reimbursing this life-changing therapy. We are now on Day 1325 and no explanation for the delay has been offered.|Email|6-10
Grassroots directive: In the past we have asked our members, supporters and friends to email their local politicians to support the reimbursement of the gene therapy Luxturna.
